title: eslint-plugin-react-hooks: 'Hook is being called conditionally' error outside condition
body:
**Do you want to request a *feature* or report a *bug*?** BUG (possibly) **What is the current behavior?** The plugin is showing this error: >React Hook "useState" is called conditionally. React Hooks must be called in the exact same order in every component render. Did you accidentally call a React Hook after an early return? (react-hooks/rules-of-hooks)eslint But I don't think I'm calling any hooks conditionally.
